word: IN TOLEDO, WHEN WE WERE BEARING OUR MESSAGE ON THE STREET, A MAN WHO WAS A POLISH CATHOLIC STOOD ON THE STREET WHEN MRS. MACKIN WAS SPEAKING; AND AS THE SPIRIT OF GOD CAME UPON HER, AND SPOKE TO THEM THROUGH HER IN ANOTHER LANGUAGE THAT SHE COULD NOT UNDERSTAND, THIS POLISH GENTLEMAN EXCLAIMED, "I KNOW WHAT THAT LADY IS SPEAKING. SHE IS SPEAKING IN MY OWN TONGUE OF A CALAMITY WHICH IS SOON TO BE VISITED ON THIS CITY."
